Function Documentation

DLListIterator scripter_dsa_add ( DLList *  list_handle,
ScripterDataItem *  scripter_data 
)

Adds Scripter Data Item to linked list of scripter data structures.

Parameters:
list_handle pointer to linked list of Scripter Data Item.
scripter_data pointer to Scripter Data Item structure.
Returns:
pointer to Scripter Data Item structure, or returns INITPTR if operation failed.
Possible errors: INITPTR if Scripter Data Item adding to list failed.

int scripter_dsa_add_symbol ( DLListIterator  scr_data_item,
TSChar *  symbol_name 
)

Adds symbol name data to Scripter Data Item structure.

Parameters:
scr_data_item pointer to list item in linked list.
symbol_name Pointer symbol name string.
Returns:
returns 0 error value when adding completed successfully, or returns error value if operation failed.
Possible errors: -1 If adding operation failed.

Parameters:

DLL_type enumeration value of DLL type.
Returns:
pointer to Scripter Data Item structure, or returns INITPTR if operation failed.
Possible errors: INITPTR if Scripter Data Item creating to list failed.

void scripter_dsa_free ( ScripterDataItem **  scripter_data  ) 

Frees the memory allocation of Scripter Data Item structure.

Parameters:
scripter_data reference pointer to Scripter Data Item.
Possible errors: If returns INITPTR value in scripter_data then operation failed.

int scripter_dsa_remove ( DLListIterator  scr_data_item  ) 

Removes Scripter Data Item structure from linked list.

Parameters:
scr_data_item pointer to list item in linked list.
Returns:
returns 0 error value is removing completed successfully, or returns error value if operation failed.
Possible errors: -1 If removing operation failed.
